name: Destructive Device
description:
MindFlow's new album!!! Amazing production by Ben Grosse (Disturbed, Slipknot)
Comes with poster and a wonderful booklet.

Boiling and aggressive!!!!

And there is more: Comes with the amazing Alternative Reality Game "Follow your Instinct" . Play and be part of this web of intrigue and solve the case before is too late...

name: Elite Trooper Membership
description:
It cant get any better than that. ELITE TROOPER delivers all The MindFlow Street Team power!

You'll get:

- Access to exclusive areas and MindFlow awesome goodies
- Autographed poster with your name on it!
- FREE shiping when buying any MindFlow CD
- VERY SPECIAL PRICES at MindFlow's gig store
- OH! If the band is near you just come! Meet n`Greet with the band for you!

This is a one payment only membership!

name: Mind over Body
description: MindFlow's second studio album brings 80 minutes of a high energy progressive metal. Inside this luxurius Double Digitray you will find a 24 pages booklet and the Comic Book "Follow your Instinct". Besides all that MindFlow present us an revolution as they include an ARG (Alternate Reallity Game) inviting us to solve a misterious crime! Really cool!
